definition: for the sake of/for the purpose of
variant of 為|为[wei4], because of/for/to
variant of 為|为[wei2]/as (i.e. in the capacity of)/to take sth as/to act as/to serve as/to behave as/to become/to be/to do
as (in the capacity of)/to take sth as/to act as/to serve as/to behave as/to become/to be/to do/by (in the passive voice)
of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
variant of 是[shi4]/(used in given names)

sentences.english: I send this Valen tine’s card to remind you that I love you.
sentences.chinese: 我送上这张卡片，为的是要提醒你，我爱你。

sentences.english: The doors were painted blue to match the walls.
sentences.chinese: 门漆成了兰色，为的是与墙的颜色相配。

sentences.english: Our wounds make us into someone's healer.
sentences.chinese: 我们的受伤，为的是叫我们能做别人的医者。

sentences.english: I rose so early as to be in time for the first train.
sentences.chinese: 我起得这么早，为的是赶头班火车。

sentences.english: Sometimes siblings betray to each other in order to posse a piece of legacy.
sentences.chinese: 有时候，兄弟姐妹反目成仇，为的是多的一份财产。

sentences.english: I asked, in order to rouse him; for he would not stir.
sentences.chinese: 我问，为的是要唤醒他，因为他一动也不动。

sentences.english: This lofty virtue had three domiciles in Paris for the sake of escaping from the police.
sentences.chinese: 这年高德劭的人在巴黎有三处寓所，为的是躲避警察。

sentences.english: He is immersed in his work, in order to recovers from the pain of lossing parents.
sentences.chinese: 他埋头工作为的是要从失去双亲的痛苦中恢复过来。

sentences.english: The Christians is called upon to make his material possessions immaterial.
sentences.chinese: 基督徒蒙召为的是将他拥有的有形财富变成无形的。

sentences.english: The twigs used for this purpose were from aromatic trees and therefore freshened the mouth, as well as cleaning it.
sentences.chinese: 它取材于香料树，为的是清新和清洁口腔。

sentences.english: I left home early so as to catch the first bus.
sentences.chinese: 我很早就出了门，为的是能赶上头班车。

sentences.english: We started early so as to get tITe ago ten.
sentences.chinese: 咱们很早动身，为的是十点前赶到。

sentences.english: We illuminate the enemy plane with searchlights in order to shoot at it.
sentences.chinese: 我们用探照灯照射敌机为的是向其射击。

sentences.english: We know there're many difficulties, it's only for a beautiful tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 我们知道很苦，披星戴月为的是拥有美好的明天。

sentences.english: We live only to discover beauty.
sentences.chinese: 我们活着只为的是去发现美。

sentences.english: It is futile to attempt to convince him that certain things are simply undoable.
sentences.chinese: 使他相信某事情是完全不可为的是无用的尝试。
